item.title: Tunnista aikamuoto
item.description: Tunnista aikamuoto .modal-open { overflow: hidden } .modal { position: fixed; top: 50px; right: 0; bottom: 0; left: 0; z-index: 1050; display: none; overflow: hidden; -webkit-overflow-scrolling: touch; outline: 0 } .modal.fade .modal-dialog { -webkit-transform: translate(0, -25%); -ms-transform: translate(0, -25%); -o-transform: translate(0, -25%); transform: translate(0, -25%); -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform .3s ease-out; -o-transition: -o-transform .3s ease-out; transition: -webkit-transform .3s ease-out; transition: transform .

item.title: Epäsäännölliset verbit a-e
item.description: Oh dear! Väärä vastaus Nyt ei menny ihan niinku piti, mutta koita uudestaan! Takaisin alkuun function Quiz(questions) { this.score = 0; this.questions = questions; this.questionIndex = 0; } Quiz.prototype.getQuestionIndex = function() { return this.questions[this.questionIndex]; } Quiz.prototype.guess = function(answer) { if (this.getQuestionIndex().isCorrectAnswer(answer)) { this.score++; } else { $("#modal").modal("show") sleep(2000); } this.questionIndex++; } Quiz.prototype.isEnded = function() { return this.
